title: In Kansas City, It's A Generational Thing
teaser: Jeremy Bernfeld of KCUR talks to Royals fans in their 20s who have known only losing, and to little kids who have grown up with a winner.
contentencoded:
Tomorrow the Kansas City Royals and the San Francisco Giants meet in Game 1 of baseball’s World Series. It’s been 29 years since the Royals have made it to the playoffs, so there are twenty-something fans who have known only losing, and little kids who have grown up with a winner.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Jeremy Bernfeld of KCUR has met them both.

Reporter

  • Jeremy Bernfeld, editor of Harvest Public Media, based at KCUR in Kansas City. He tweets @jeremybernfeld.
